Package Sprites

Class Gun

  • java.lang.Object
    • Sprites.Gun
  • public class Gun
extends java.lang.Object
    This class handles the guns that are used by aircraft, bases and other entities
    Author:
    Nihal Ernest, Krishan Patel, and Fabio Eirea
